metadata.description: Eco-friendly soaps made from recycled coffee grounds. Sustainable, natural, and good for your skin.

hero.title: Crafted from Used Coffee Grounds
hero.description: Explore our range of eco-friendly soaps crafted with care using natural ingredients, designed to rejuvenate your skin while honoring the planet.

story.whoWeAreText: At Adama Soaps, we pride ourselves on creating natural, eco-friendly soaps from used coffee grounds. Our focus is on simplicity, honesty, and sustainability, aiming to reduce waste while delivering high-quality products that nurture your skin.
story.ourMissionText: We strive to promote sustainability through our handcrafted soaps and engage consumers about the benefits of coffee grounds as an ingredient.
story.whyText: Our commitment to the environment guides every step of our process, from sourcing materials to packaging, ensuring that your choice of soap is one that supports a healthy planet.
story.foundersAlt: Denise and Yoav - Adama Soaps Founders

paragraphs.p1: It all started when my boyfriend said, "Honey, we should make soap!" I thought he was being clean about our relationship, but no‚Äîhe literally meant soap.
paragraphs.p2: Armed with nothing but recycled coffee grounds (because apparently throwing them away is a grounds for divorce) and an unreasonable amount of YouTube tutorials, we embarked on our lathery journey.
paragraphs.p3: The first batch? Let's just say it was a total wash. The second batch? A clean sweep of failures. But by the third batch, we finally got it right‚Äîand that's when things really started to soap up!
paragraphs.p4: Now we make all our soaps by hand in Germany, using only the finest natural ingredients and a healthy dose of questionable puns. Our motto? "We're lye-ing if we say it's easy, but we're not lye-ing about the quality!"
paragraphs.p5: P.S. My boyfriend insists I mention that she does 90% of the actual work. I provide moral support and terrible jokes. It's a clean division of labor. üßº

whyCoffeeGrounds.title: Why Coffee Grounds?
whyCoffeeGrounds.text: Because we're recycling champions and because coffee grounds are nature's best exfoliant. Plus, it gives us an excuse to drink more coffee during the "research phase." Win-win! ‚òï
